mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELLER_ACCOUNT(SEL_EMAIL, SEL_NAME, SEL_PW, SEL_JOB, SEL_FIELD, SEL_INTEREST, SEL_SENDEMAIL) VALUES(#{sel_email}, #{sel_name}, #{sel_pw}, #{sel_job}, #{sel_field}, #{sel_interest}, #{sel_sendemail} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SELLER_ACCOUNT WHERE SEL_EMAIL = #{sel_email} AND SEL_PW = #{sel_pw}
